content.question: During aerobic cellular respiration, oxygen gas is consumed at the same rate as carbon dioxide gas is produced. In order to provide accurate volumetric measurements of oxygen gas consumption, the experimental setup should include which of the following?

choices.label: A substance that removes carbon dioxide gas
A valve to release excess water

content.answer: A substance that removes carbon dioxide gas

skill.text: 3.C: Identify experimental procedures that align with the question, including: i. identifying dependent and independent variables ii. identifying appropriate controls iii. justifying appropriate controls
